concept.title: Solution architecture overview
concept.shortdesc: Introduction to the solution architecture of the product line.

section.title: Solution General Architecture
section.p: The main solution components of have been designed to operate with maximum independence in order to facilitate unlimited scalability. These components operate under the management of in order to distribute computing jobs to an unlimited number of cluster nodes each running an unlimited number of components.

The provides organizations with the ability to deploy and manage a massively distributed computing infrastructure as is needed to control the operations of a wide range of equipment systems and business operations.

section.title: Technology Management Solution
section.p: from provides a comprehensive technology management solution that enables large-scale enterprises to proactively manage their technology infrastructure. In particular, faciltiates the efficient utilization of sophisticated computing services and does so in such a way that enables almost unlimited scalability. For organizations managing large networks of systems that need to interact on a near real-time basis, is an ideal solution. assembles together a variety of specialized components that together provide an integrated solution.

section.title: Server
section.p: server handles the communication between the instances and the supporting nodes. It manages the data which the deployed analysis nodes collect from the set of cluster node servers and which are used to coordinate server activities. The server receives event notifications from nodes and other components, and then sends out instructions according to the rules that have been configured.

section.title: Reporting Server
section.p: reporting server is a web-based reporting tool consisting of Workbooks. It collects data from the database and allows the publishing of Dashboard views or individual Worksheets. These Worksheets can be accessed by authorized users through the environment or through the system administration tools.

section.title: Analytics Server
section.p: is an analytics server that generates a number of reports and visualizations of the data being aggregated by the deployment. It provides an overall statistical view of the entire cluster. provides dynamic views of the historical behaviour of hosts, resources, and workload across the cluster so that administrators can get an overall picture of clusterâ€™s performance.

A instance is installed on each cluster. This component synchronizes data storage and processing across the different cluster nodes. Each instance collects data from nodes receiving the initial updates and distributes the data resources to other nodes according to configuration rules specified.

A virtual is associated with each cluster grid. This components provides a secure data persistence service available to all processes running on all cluster nodes. The service collects not only operational data resources but also all administrative and maintenance data resources produced as a byproduct of all transactions.

The application provides the User Interface (UI) for the product environment. The application provides a mobile interface through which users can, in accordance with their security rights, access and interact with various components of the system.
